headline: BofA Adjusts Elevance Health (ELV) Target to Reflect Higher Sector Valuations
summary: Elevance Health, Inc. (NYSE:ELV) is included among the 12 Best Long Term US Stocks to Buy Now. On December 16, BofA lifted its price target on Elevance Health, Inc. (NYSE:ELV) to $385 from $370 and kept a Neutral rating. The firm noted that its higher target reflects richer multiples across the peer group. Elevance Health, […]

headline: Citigroup Stock Outshines Mag-7 in 2025: What Awaits in 2026?
summary: C shares jump 62.9% in 2025, beating most Mag-7 names as restructuring, rate cuts and revived deal activity lift confidence heading into 2026.

headline: Looking at the Narrative for AerCap After Analyst Upgrades and Tight Leasing Market Developments
summary: AerCap Holdings has seen a modest uptick in its fair value estimate to about $149.22 per share, as analysts update their models after an exceptional quarter and ongoing tightness in the aircraft leasing market. While the discount rate remains essentially flat at roughly 13.46%, assumptions around long term revenue trends have improved slightly, reflecting greater confidence in the durability of demand and lease rates. As this evolving narrative continues to drive incremental recalibrations to...
